title: In Good Faith
description: New YorkLibby Michalowski was livid. Being labeled a spinster and presented with a bizarre marriage contract had made her the laughingstock of her colleagues. Instead of winning her hand, Joseph Landowski, mystery suitor, was going to get a piece of her mind!But one look at Joe and Libby knew he was beyond reproach. No man that breathtakingly handsome...more - that enticingly sexy - would need a matchmaker. In fact, Libby was hoping they could eliminate the middleman altogether.
author: Judith McWilliams
